entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
